scripts.start-all:linux: npm run clone-frontend && npm install --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend && concurrently "BROWSER=None npm start --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend" "electron-forge start"
scripts.start-all:win32: npm run clone-frontend && npm install --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend && set "BROWSER=none" && concurrently "npm start --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend" "electron-forge start"
scripts.make-all: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && electron-forge make
scripts.build-frontend: npm run clone-frontend && npm install --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend && npm run build --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend
scripts.build-backend:linux: npm run clone-backend && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Backend && virtualenv .venv && . ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -e . && pyinstaller --onefile opp/rest_api.py && deactivate && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot
scripts.build-backend:win32: npm run clone-backend && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Backend && IF NOT EXIST .venv (virtualenv .venv) && .\.venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -e . && pyinstaller --onefile opp/rest_api.py && deactivate && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot
